con:restRequest.name: CreateShipment
con:restRequest.con:request: { "externalReferenceId": "${RequestProperties#ExternalReferenceId}", "toAddress": { "addressee": "Jeff West", "addressLine1": "123 Main St", "addressLine2": null, "city": "Los Angeles", "state": "CA", "postalCode": "90036" }, "fromAddress": { "addressee": "Larry Ellison", "addressLine1": "Oracle HQ", "addressLine2": null, "city": "Redwood Shores", "state": "CA", "postalCode": "12345" }, "shippingServiceName": null, "parcels": [ { "contents": "stuff", "height": 1, "width": 2, "length": 3, "weight": 4, "parcelStatus": "BILLING_INFO_RECEIVED" }, { "contents": "more stuff", "height": 1, "width": 2, "length": 3, "weight": 4, "parcelStatus": "BILLING_INFO_RECEIVED" } ] }
